title: Garbage company, honestly.
body:
Either disable ranked if there are issues or fix the problem. I gave a ranked game a try, I am with Optus, to see if i was ok.  Apparently i am not, i was left with the shitty logo and a black screen. Not being able to connect, lose my final promo game. Its dumb as fuck that you can Dodge in select once per day but if you get fucked by the shit game after that countdown in lobby, you lose.

If the team chooses to remake, what is the difference between that and dodging. 

Shit system, shit game, Shit company. Back to Fortnite.

replies.body: 90% sure its a troll. he has no games played recently.
He's a victim. Leave him be.
